name: Bullseye Shot
text: You slow your breath, calm yourself, and hit the bullseye, just as you were trained to do.
prerequisites: Point-Blank Shot, Precise Shot, base attack bonus +5.
benefit: You can spend a move action to steady your shot. When you do, you gain a +4 bonus on your next ranged attack roll before the end of your turn.
staminaText: You can spend 5 stamina points to use Bullseye Shot as a swift action.
text_zh: 你知道如何在射击时调整呼吸，放松身体，以求一击命中。
benefit_zh: 你可以花费一个移动动作校准自己的瞄线，如果你这样做，你将在本轮结束之前的下一次远程攻击投骰时获得+4加值。
staminaText_zh: 你可以消耗5点耐力来以一个迅捷动作使用中的射击。
